name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant v. Preston HUNT, Appellee

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant v. Preston HUNT, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 31st day of August, 2015, the Order of the Court of Common Pleas is hereby AFFIRMED. See Commonwealth v. Hopkins, 632 Pa. 36, 117 A.3d 247 (2015).
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Hugh J. Burns, Jr., Philadelphia, for Commonwealth of Pennsylvania.
Katrina Marie Young, Karl Baker, Peter Rosalsky, Defender Association of Philadelphia, Philadelphia, for Preston Hunt.
casebody.head_matter:
122 A.3d 363
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant v. Preston HUNT, Appellee.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Aug. 31, 2015.
Hugh J. Burns, Jr., Philadelphia, for Commonwealth of Pennsylvania.
Katrina Marie Young, Karl Baker, Peter Rosalsky, Defender Association of Philadelphia, Philadelphia, for Preston Hunt.
